resources.string:
I am Santosh Rawat. 
 This is my first Kotlin Project. 
 I am New to Kotlin programming language and want to build Android apps in Kotlin. 
 This Project is Using following concepts: 
 Android Kotlin Fundamentals 
 Layout Implementation 
 Navigation from one screen to another 
 Activity and fragment lifecycles 
 Working with Fragment

 Due to some space issue in my system, i was finding difficulty in implementing and executing the code. 
 I tried my best to do.


 Kindly accept it.
